summary: Provides unit tests that verify Fedora‑specific behavior of the Apache configurator, including handling of self‑signed certificate overrides during service restarts and correct processing of multiple virtual host configurations on Fedora and other RHEL‑based distributions.
business_intent: Validate that the Certbot Apache plugin functions reliably on Fedora/RHEL systems by testing its restart logic, override mechanisms, and multi‑vhost parsing, thereby ensuring automated SSL certificate deployment works without errors on these platforms.
